name: Hentai Story Taming the Demon
description:
You should forget about the boredom, reject all that is holy, tell your friends, that you're trying to tame the demon tonight.

The gates of hell are going to open, Lilith goes to your call in the path of passion, lust, desire to conquer or submission. Discover the end of Lilith's story in Hentai Story Taming the Demon.

Press "Ctrl + F" to get an easy win
or you can win by yourself to get a special hardcore achievement.



Hentai Story Taming the Demon is a puzzle game in which you must collect all pairs of pictures to reproduce the image.

Enjoy lush pictures, great music, and leisurely gameplay with Hentai Story Taming the Demon.
